resources.title: Tumbleweird
resources.description:
Tumbleweird exists to bring together a more diverse, creative, and progressive community than Eastern Washington gets credit for, in order to connect, highlight, and encourage the betterment of our area.

We do this by publishing a community-driven paper that uncovers the region’s true identity in a way that’s always positive, often irreverent, and never timid.

resources.title: Hot Mess Burgers & Fries
resources.description:
A rebel burger shop out of a little truck in Downtown Kennewick! Our burgers are what happens when chefs with over 40 combined years culinary experience run a food truck.

Buns baked fresh everyday, American cheese made from scratch, our own ketchup recipe and so much more sets these apart from your normal burger experience!

Also-queer owned. Our Trans-woman executive chef and owner has made sure that this is a safe place for all to show up as their authentic selves!

resources.title: PFLAG Benton-Franklin Resources
resources.description: A ton of resources ranging from counseling and medica services, tattoo artists, professional services, social media groups, and third spaces

resources.title: Spectrum Counseling's LGBTQIA2+ Resource List
resources.description: Several local and national resources maintained by Dr. Kade Sharp

resources.title: The Trevor Project
resources.description: If you are thinking about harming yourself — get immediate crisis support. Connect to a crisis counselor 24/7, 365 days a year, from anywhere in the U.S via text, chat, or phone. The Trevor Project is 100% confidential and 100% free.
